Opening packs should be free, Ingame tutorial is very lackluster, graphics dated, maps could use reworks, and spray patterns really threw me off coming from other shooters. Other than that, the community is pretty chill other than your occasional bad apples, and the emphasis on teamwork that makes it required, satisfactory, and rewarding make this game a mustplay with friends atleast once for fun.
